function.name: wrap
function.help: Wraps text so that each line has a specified maximum number of characters.

parameter.name: String
parameter.help: String or variable that contains one. The text to wrap.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.help: Positive integer maximum number of characters to allow on a line.

parameter.name: strip
parameter.help: whether to remove all existing newline and carriage return characters in the input string with spaces before wrapping the text. Default: False.
